segments.text: How was your job at the state-owned enterprise ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I no longer work there . I'm working with a multi-national corporation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You changed jobs again ? Why do you move so frequently ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I want to try different things before I find the one I really like .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why don't you stick with one job for a bit longer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I could handle everything pretty well in the old position , so I decided to move around and learn something new .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm pretty satisfied with it . I can broaden my experience , learn lots of new things , and have more development opportunities .
segments.speaker: S2
